value.title: FlyFin offers AI-based tax app aimed at freelancers, gig workers
value.excerpt: This new AI tax engine replaces the self-employed and ... A desktop version is also available for Macs with an Apple M1 chip. Android users can download FlyFin’s app here.

value.title: Samsung Exynos 2200’s AMD GPU exhibits 34% peak performance improvement over predecessor
value.excerpt: A reliable leakster has shared that the AMD GPU on the Samsung Exynos 2200 exhibits 34% peak performance improvement over its predecessor.

value.title: CoreWeave, a provider of cloud services for GPU-powered apps, gets $50M
value.excerpt: CoreWeave, a specialized cloud services provider for GPU-based workloads, also partnered with Nvidia to enable companies to scale infrastructure.

value.title: AI chip startup Cerebras nabs $250 million Series F round at over $4 billion valuation
value.excerpt: New money follows Cerebras's expansion from a single system to a portfolio of products and cloud partnerships.

value.title: Luminar Lidar to Integrate with NVIDIA DRIVE Hyperion AI Platform; Shares Jump
value.excerpt: Luminar Technologies (LAZR), the global automotive lidar hardware and software technology provider, announced that its lidar solution has been selected to integrate into the sensor suite of semiconductor maker Nvidia Corporation’s (NVDA) AI vehicle computing platform for autonomous vehicles.

value.title: Li Ka-Shing-Backed AI Startup Founder Targets Electric Vehicles, Growth Amid Global Chip Shortage
value.excerpt: Albert Liu founded San Diego-based AI startup Kneron in 2015. Since then, it has raised more than $100 million in funding from investors including Alibaba, Foxconn and Hong Kong billionaire Li Ka-shing's Horizons Ventures.

value.title: New Spiking Neuromorphic Chip Could Usher in an Era of Highly Efficient AI
value.excerpt: Neurons spike in a time sequence, and it's their basis for wiring up into circuits and hierarchies, allowing highly energy-efficient processing.

value.title: AI can help overcome challenges in conventional chips, IBM’s top engineer says
value.excerpt: In an exclusive interview with The Hindu, Christian Jacobi, IBM’s Chief Architect for IBM Z Processor Design, explains the importance of AI-powered computer chips.

value.title: Nvidia debuts ReOpt to optimize supply chain routing with AI
value.excerpt: Nvidia's new ReOpt service employs AI to help shippers optimize the routing of packages bound for customers' doorsteps.

value.title: Nvidia launches Modulus, a framework for developing ‘physics-grounded’ AI models
value.excerpt: Nvidia's Modulus framework, announced at the company's fall 2021 GTC conference, enables companies to develop 'physics-grounded' AI models.

value.title: Nvidia says its GPU chip is a giant leap forward for computing
value.excerpt: Nvidia estimates that over the past 10 years, the raw computational power of its GPUs has grown by a factor of 1,000.

value.title: Nvidia’s Riva Custom Voice lets companies create custom voices powered by AI
value.excerpt: GTC conference, Nvidia unveiled Riva Custom Voice, a service designed to let customers create AI-powered custom voices.

value.title: AMD boosts performance of datacenters, technical computing, HPC, and AI
value.excerpt: AMD announced it has improved performance levels for datacenters, technical computing, high-performance computing, and AI.

value.title: AI Chipmaker Hailo Raises $136 Million
value.excerpt: AI chipmaker Hailo raised $136 million in its latest funds round, representing one of the largest investments ever in the AI chip space. It comes amid the ongoing global chip shortage, and a surge in demand for the company's technology,

value.title: AMD rolls out Instinct MI200 GPUs for HPC and AI workloads
value.excerpt: AMD on Monday unveiled the Instinct MI200 accelerator, the latest generation of its data center GPU. The chipmaker says it's the fastest HPC and AI accelerator, surpassing records set by the MI100, rolled out last year.

value.title: Intel Arc Alchemist GPU shows off AI-based XeSS magic in new Riftbreaker video

value.title: Tencent’s foray into chips isn’t at all surprising

value.title: SUNY Polytechnic leaders explain causes, solutions behind chip shortage

value.title: Better AI Stock: Nvidia or Palantir
value.excerpt: Nvidia (NASDAQ:NVDA) and Palantir operate in different sectors, but both tech companies are profiting from the secular expansion of the artificial intelligence (AI) market. Nvidia

value.title: Aptiv Tops Expectations but Chip Shortage Will Continue to Hit Self-Driving Cars
value.excerpt: The advanced automotive safety systems supplier reports earnings that beat expectations, but lingering supply-chain problems will affect the company for at least a few more quarters.

value.title: Deep Learning AI Explained: Neural Networks

value.title: Even as China Cracks Down on Tech, AI Companies Plan IPOs
value.excerpt: SenseTime and Megvii both include facial recognition technology among their offerings and do a lot of business with government agencies.

value.title: IBM Research and NeuReality Announce Partnership For AI
value.excerpt: IBM (NYSE: IBM) and NeuReality, an Israeli AI systems and semiconductor company, have signed an agreement to develop the next generation of high-performance AI inference platforms that will deliver disruptive cost and power consumption improvements for deep learning use cases.

value.title: Pharma startup Quris aims to use a ‘patient on a chip’ to target drug delivery
value.excerpt: Pharma startup Quris aims to use AI, knowledge of the human genome, and a "patient on a chip" to improve drug delivery.

value.title: Ford Taps Non-IT Professionals to Broaden Its AI Expertise
value.excerpt: The auto maker has trained more than 1,000 employees on a platform it developed to put AI tools in the hands of people across the company.

value.title: Untether AI Touts “At-Memory” Architecture, Promising Efficiency And Performance At The Edge
value.excerpt: Untether AI recently emerged from stealth and described their architecture as being “At-Memory”, which the company claims will deliver leading performance and power efficiency. Most products that claim the latter deliver relatively weak performance (with the exception of Qualcomm’s CloudAI 100).

value.title: Intel Habana AI Accelerator Becomes Available On Amazon EC2
value.excerpt: The Amazon EC2 DL1 instance type delivers up to 8 Gaudi accelerators with 32 GB of high bandwidth memory (HBM) per accelerator with 400 Gbps of networking throughput and 4 TB of local NVMe storage.
